OOC: I'm not sure what is the situation with this beam is exactly. Could
someone fill me in on what happaned. But since people tell me it is up
to me, I'll post for the City's damage.

BIC: The beam struck Maximal City, causing it to shake violently. The
City's armor plating began to singe, as cortch marks appeared, in some
places. The City mostly suffered outter structure damage. No system
damage was done.
